畕字的基本解释

畕
jiāng
古同“疆”。

畕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāng］
［《字彙》居良切］
相邻的田地。《说文·田部》：“畕，比田也。从二田。”一说同“疆1”。《正字通·田部》：“畕，畺本字……《正譌》：'畕，田界也。从二田會意。'或作畺，俗作疆。”一说以疆界义释畕为误。
[②]［jiàng］
同“疆2”。

畕字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　畕； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页760第38
【唐韻】【集韻】?居良切，音薑。【說文】比田也。从二田。

畕字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
畕字的起名意思

古同“疆”。

畕
Basic explanation of words
畕
jiāng
Ancient Tong "Jiangsu".
畕
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāng］
["Zihui" Juliangqi]
Adjacent fields. "Shuowen·Tianbu": "Ji, Hita. From Ertian." The same thing as "Jiang 1". "Zhengzitong·Tianbu": "Zheng, 畺本字..."Zhengjian":'Zheng, Tianjie also. Know the meaning from Ertian.' Or make the 畺, the vulgar makes the border." One said that the meaning of the border is to explain the 畕 as the boundary. error.
[②]［jiàng］
Same as "Jiangsu 2".
畕
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection] [Tian Zi Department] 　畕; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 760 Page 38
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Juliang cut, sound ginger. [Said the text] Hita also. From Ertian.
畕
